meanings.definition: A strong feeling of affection and care towards someone.
meanings.sent1: My truelove for my family is endless.
meanings.sent2: She knew he was her truelove from the moment they met.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally packed my truelove's lunch instead of mine!
meanings.sent4: Her truelove for animals is as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The bond between them was a truelove that could never be broken.

meanings.definition: A person who is deeply loved and cherished.
meanings.sent2: He was her truelove, her rock in times of trouble.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks he's the truelove of the household!
meanings.sent4: She treated her truelove with the utmost respect and care.
meanings.sent5: In her eyes, he was not just a friend but a truelove.

meanings.definition: To have a strong and genuine affection for someone.
meanings.sent1: I truelove my best friend more than words can express.
meanings.sent2: They truelove each other deeply and unconditionally.
meanings.sent3: I truelove chocolate so much, I could eat it every day!
meanings.sent4: His truelove for music was evident in the way he played the piano.
meanings.sent5: She trueloves to spend time in nature, feeling at peace.
